meanings.definition: Metal tools used for pressing clothes.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses the irons to make our clothes neat and smooth.
meanings.sent2: The irons are essential for removing wrinkles from garments.
meanings.sent3: The irons danced across the fabric, leaving it crisp and tidy.
meanings.sent4: She wielded the irons like a magician, transforming the wrinkled shirt into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The irons hummed with heat, ready to work their magic on the wrinkled shirt.

meanings.sent1: He carefully selected the irons for his golf game, ensuring he had the right tools.
meanings.sent2: The irons in his golf bag gleamed under the sun as he prepared for his swing.
meanings.sent3: The irons whispered promises of a perfect shot as he lined up his aim.
meanings.sent4: With a swift swing, he sent the irons flying through the air towards the distant hole.
meanings.sent5: The irons connected with the ball, sending it soaring across the green with precision.

meanings.definition: Metal chains used to restrain prisoners.
meanings.sent1: The clink of the irons echoed through the prison corridors, a constant reminder of captivity.
meanings.sent2: The weight of the irons on his ankles made every step a struggle for the prisoner.
meanings.sent3: The irons seemed to mock the prisoner, dragging behind him as he tried to escape.
meanings.sent4: The irons symbolized the loss of freedom, binding the prisoner to his fate.
meanings.sent5: The prisoner's spirit remained unbroken, despite the heavy burden of the irons.
